channel.title: Sig pl0zers
channel.description:
Yeah, no matter how hard I try I can't seem to come up with a good idea for a sig, so I was wondering if one of you talented gfx people would be so kind to make me a sig.
Only requirements:
350x110 dark text: JDB or therealjdb
(preferably themed after cars, money, or women(or all three) but not necessary)
Thank you <3

item.title: Sig pl0zers
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

[quote=“billygotshot, post:7, topic:144438”]dude i know how to use the pen tool like that it is so easy. And i knew how to use it before exe started to use it aswell :P[/quote]Because billgotshot is a haxor and stole my brain.

[quote=“fellixombc, post:5, topic:144438”]may i ask how do you use the pen tool like that?[/quote]You can’t use the pen tool? After all that shit you told me about you being so pro? Your so much better than me? Damn, your a fucking genius.

Read full topic

item.title: Sig pl0zers
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

Yea I’ve finally worked out how to use it now I’m over using it xD
[/quote]
may i ask how do you use the pen tool like that?[/quote]

dude i know how to use the pen tool like that it is so easy. And i knew how to use it before exe started to use it aswell

Read full topic

item.title: Sig pl0zers
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

fellixombc:

may i ask how do you use the pen tool like that?

Didn’t you say you were the best person here besides me and Exe?

Surely you could figure out something as simple and using the pen tool…

@Oxy: Tis nice, just don’t over do the style, people will get bored of your sigs QUICKLY.

Read full topic
